title: News24.com | 2 Nelson Mandela Bay councillors accused of breaking lockdown laws
description: Two Nelson Mandela Bay councillors have been arrested and fined for contravening lockdown regulations - and an act which has now been condemned by the ANC in the Eastern Cape.
content:
Two Nelson Mandela Bay councillors have been arrested and fined for contravening lockdown regulations, says the ANC in the Eastern Cape, which wants the municipality to take disciplinary action against them.
ANC provincial secretary Lulama Ngcukayitobi said … [+1300 chars]
